mapper.sql: a.BASE_ID as "baseId", a.BASE_CREATE_USER_ID as "baseCreateUserId", a.BASE_CREATE_TM as "baseCreateTime", a.BASE_UPDATE_USER_ID as "baseUpdateUserId", a.BASE_UPDATE_TM as "baseUpdateTime", a.BASE_STATUS as "baseStatus", a.BASE_REMARKS as "baseRemarks", a.BASE_CREATE_IP as "baseCreateIp", a.BASE_UPDATE_IP as "baseUpdateIp"
